Reviews.Content: Nice stay in Florence Conveniently located, these rooms to rent are the perfect solution to visit Florence without dilapidating a fortune! It's just a short stroll from down town, right behind the renowned mercato (market) square (a safe area by night too, being owercroweded with tourists!!!). Rooms are in good conditions, although a bit small, and very quiet, as long as they face the backyards. They provide you with all you can need to prepare your very italian colazione (breakfast): tea; instant coffe/cappuccino; espresso; croissants/buiscuits/bread + jam/Nutella. The same philosophy applies to the apt itself: on arrival, they will provide you with the keys to get in any time you want. Cleaned on daily basis.
Reviews.Author: Niqoletta

Reviews.Content: Excellent Place This place is excellent.Is really close from the station, and just a few steps away from Mercato Centrale and Il Duomo.The place is really clean, the suites are new, and with a nice decoration. The bathroom is private in good conditions and clean.The owner is really nice, also the ladies that are in charge are always ready to help you (they speak also spanish).
Reviews.Author: trotamundos83

Reviews.Content: Great Place With A Great Price And a Great Attitude And Wonderful!       On our walk we saw this bridge
Reviews.Author: lynnetteandjason

Reviews.Content: Great for the price! I stayed here with two friends. The beds were comfortable, we felt very safe, everything was very clean, and the housekeeper was extremely friendly. All amenities were as advertised. The breakfast was nothing to write home about (packaged biscuits and croissants), but it was nice to have coffee and tea in the room.Sure, the bathroom is a bit small, but it's par for the course in theprice range. The location was quite convenient for walking to all of central Firenze.I would certainly recommend this soggiorno to any active budget traveler looking for a place to rest his or her head.
Reviews.Author: AdriainPDX

Reviews.Content: Didn't like it. The bathroom in this soggiorno is horrible, when we complained, the owner (by phone) was incredibly rude (yelling and everything), even threaten to charge the additional nights we were going to stay when we told her we wre leaving due to her behavior. Will never stay there again and don't reccomend it to anyone.
Reviews.Author: Palotico

Reviews.Content: a noisy b this bb is in a lively area near the station.it's full of shops and restaurants.also,near the san lorenzo market.we had an apartment because there were no doubles available.it was a nice apartment up 2 flights of stairs.however,no double-glazing made it quite noisy.the breakfast provided was barely passable but it was handy to have a tea kettle.i think one can do better in florence.
Reviews.Author: gabyna

Reviews.Content: Excellent value!       View from the outside
Reviews.Author: lalawgirl

Reviews.Content: Cute, central, great value We had a great three-night stay at Soggiorno Pezzati Daniela. Our room was plain and small, and the bathroom is quite small as you would expect in a budget hotel in Florence, but it was clean, a great value, and the location was quite central to all the major attractions in the city. What made the hotel special, though, was the owner, Daniela Pezzati. She was very nice, provided restaurant recommendations that proved to be spot-on, and made us feel quite welcome as first-time visitors to Florence. I'd definitely stay here again.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: Good Value For Money Good location, 10 mins away from the train station and 10 mins or less from many of the attractions. Our double room was clean, had a working AC, cable tv and tea making facilities. The bathroom was small but it was ok. We paid 69 Euros for our double room which included breakfast but that was basically 2 packaged plain toasts, 2 packaged croissants and instant coffee that was delivered to the room. The area around the hotel seemed a bit shady and might not be safe for single female travellers. But, there were many laundrettes and net cafes in the area.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: Good Value but be careful       bathroom
Reviews.Author: gwenkay

Reviews.Content: Great find This little inn located just minutes from all of Florence's sights is a find for those looking for basic, clean accomodation. Each room is outfitted with small private baths and you can't beat the price. The owner, Daniela, is very helpful. I would recommend this place for seasoned travelers to Europe, those who do not need large rooms with TV, phones, and well-appointed bathrooms. Traveling on my own, this place was definitely a great deal.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
